segments.text: What are we going to eat for dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever meal that you plan on making .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought you were making dinner tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your food tastes so much better than mine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Save it . If you want something to eat , then make it yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You really want me to cook tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a long day today . I really am not in the mood to make anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I'm going to go take a nap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like me to come get you when the food is done ?
segments.speaker: S1
